projects.title: Dahlia Asbl
projects.description: Dahlia Asbl is a non-profit association website built in React. With Dahlia, you can donate through PayPal, a Visa card, or Mastercard. Dahlia's website is bilingual.

projects.title: Dashboard Covid
projects.description: This project is about monitoring covid19 disease in DRC, managing health zones, updating daily situations, official dashboard of the Congolese Ministry of Health.

projects.title: MagoEat Back
projects.description: This project is the backend project built with ExpressJs, MongoDB, and Mongoose as the ORM. This app makes the frontend Mobile App dynamic and connects it to the database.

projects.title: Books Helper
projects.description: A twitter-like web application to suggest books and impression on them between friends
